comment: Oct.2.2018 US ambassador to NATO says it may be necessary to "take out" the new Russian intermediate missiles of the type Iskander, which Russia has tested in Kaliningrad. "Russia is breaking the INF Agreement on medium-range missiles ," said Kay Bailey Hutchison"If diplomacy doesn'twork itmay it be necessary to deter", she added.
